description: Tyler Torro has had his eye on Adam Wirthmore for a while now. Tyler sees him quite frequently at the gym, but just hasn't devised a plan to approach him... til now. Tyler has decided to take advantage of Adam's curiosity, so he baits Adam into helping him with his form. Works like a charm. In no time, Adam is helping Tyler with more than his weightlifting, and the two of them partake in a different sort of workout.Enjoy!
title: BAIT & SWITCH
